actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish a grant program that will support efforts at the State level to establish anti-bullying task forces to study, address, and reduce bullying in elementary and secondary schools, and for other purposes.

summary.text: This bill directs the Department of Education to make grants for state task forces to study, address, and reduce bullying in elementary schools and secondary schools.

titles.title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish a grant program that will support efforts at the State level to establish anti-bullying task forces to study, address, and reduce bullying in elementary and secondary schools, and for other purposes.
